EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event_Cloud Native Roadshow_2017.Atlanta Reminder
EmailTemplate.subject: See you tomorrow at the Cloud-Native Roadshow
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
We are looking forward to seeing you tomorrow in Atlanta at the Cloud-Native Roadshow. Please review the event details below and feel free to email the team at cloudnativeroadshow@pivotal.io <[[mailto:cloudnativeroadshow@pivotal.io]]> with any questions.
Date: Friday, April 28, 2017
Time: 8:30am - 3:45pm
Location: Twelve Atlantic Station 361 17th St NW, Atlanta, GA 30363 (map <[[https://www.google.com/maps/place/Twelve+Atlantic+Station/@33.791628,-84.4002797,17z/data=!3m1!4b1!4m5!3m4!1s0x88f504f79bcc78ed:0xc3f68760edc38cb4!8m2!3d33.791628!4d-84.398091?hl=en]]>)
Agenda:
8:30am - 9:30am Registration & Breakfast 9:30am - 12:00pm Sessions 12:00pm - 1:00pm Lunch 12:40pm - 1:00pm Presentations by our Ecosystem Partners 1:00pm - 3:45pm Sessions
Review the full agenda HERE <[[pivotal.io/event/pivotal-cloud-native-roadshow/atlanta?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=cloud-native-roadshow-2017]]>.
We look forward to seeing you! The Pivotal Team
